page.title: 07My parents' shop
page.content: My name is Rebecca. My mother and father own a shop. It is in Milton.They sell mostly milk, bread,biscuits and crisps.Their neighbourhood is very friendly.The customers are from all walks of life. Most people are helpful and approximately 300 people come into the shop in a day.The busiest day is Friday because there are orders to be made up and delivered as well as weekend shopping. Deliveries are twice a week.For them it is a very difficult life in the shop.Most people shop here and not elsewhere because they might just live round the corner or because they could want personal service.
